sn35.242:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kimilāyaṃ viharati gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre.
sn35.242:4.2: Addasā kho bhagavā mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamānaṃ.
sn35.242:4.4: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amuṃ mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamānan”ti?
sn35.242:4.6: evaṃ vutte, āyasmā kimilo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.242:4.7: “kiṃ nu kho, bhante, orimaṃ tīraṃ … pe …
sn35.242:4.9: Idha, kimila, bhikkhu aññataraṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā na vuṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati.
